21634.「おお <pc>！ 待っておったぞ！\n 転送装置を動かす 三闘士のオノが\n:
<pc>! You're just in time!
The Axe of the Triad is finally finished!

21635.「これで カルサドラ火山に行けるぞよ！\n 余も やれば できるのじゃ！:
Now we can go inside the Calsadora Volcano!
See? Even I can do it if I put my mind to
it and try!

21636.「ふん！ そんな たいそうなもんを\n こしらえることが できるなんて……。\n:
Hmph! To think you were able to make somethin'
THAT fancy... Guess you're not who I thought
you were!

21637.「一日中 ぼーっとしてたときのアンタが\n いちばん キラキラ 輝いていたですよ:
You were at your brightest when you just
stood there all day spaced out! Just
hurry up and snap out of it!

21638.「……<pc> 準備はいい？\n ビャンくんが作った 三闘士のオノを使って\n:
You ready, <pc>? We'll head to the
crater in the volcano and use the Axe
that Byan made.

21639.「そして そこで あやしい儀式をしている\n 魔物たちを 撃退するの！:
That's when we'll beat up those monsters
and stop their weird ritual!

21640.「うむ。その魔物たちを率いるは\n 我が祖国のカタキ グルヤンラシュに相違ない。:
Yes. It must be that fiend Guryan Rush who is
leading those monsters. The time for revenge
is nigh!

21641.「火口付近へと通じる 古代の転送装置は\n モガリム街道を 南に抜けた先の\n:
The ancient transporter is located in the
center of the Raniakka Fault Zone, just
south of the Mogarim Highway.

21642.「まずは ラニアッカ断層帯へ行き\n カルサドラ火山に 乗り込むとしようぞ！\n:
First, we go there and make our way into the
volcano! That is when I will exact my revenge!

21643.「うむ！ よくぞ申した！\n それでは ラニアッカ断層帯に\n 足を運ぶとするぞ:
Yes! Well said! Let's make our way towards
the Raniakka Fault Zone!

21644.「オノの彫像がある 円形の台座が転送装置じゃ。\n 起動器具の三闘士のオノは 余:
The circular pedestal that bears a statue of
an axe is the transporter. I will carry the
Axe, so please wait there.

21645.「ラニアッカにある 古代の転送装置か……。\n よし！ それじゃ 私は先に行くね:
So the transporter is in Raniakka...
Okay! I'll go on ahead. Meet you there!

21646.「それでは <pc>。\n 我らも 出立するとしようぞ。\n 余は そちの後を:
Let us depart as well, <pc>.
I will follow behind you.

21647.「……ムムッ！\n そちは 下々の者の依頼を たくさん抱えており\n 余の頼みは:
...What's this?! It seems you're too burdened
with requests from other common folk to help
with mine.

21648.「……まあ よい。余は 寛大じゃからな。\n とはいえ 事態は 一刻を争うのじゃ:
Well, no matter. I'm a magnanimous man.
However, this situation is time sensitive.
Don't dally too long with your other requests.

21649.「……なんと！ この出陣の気炎の中\n そちは 奮い立たぬと申すか！\n 見損な:
What?! Amidst this call to battle, you are
still not inspired?! I am disappointed in you!

21650.「とはいえ 頼れるのは そちしか おらぬ。\n そう言わずに 手を貸してくれぬか:
Even still...you are the only person I can
rely on. Won't you reconsider? I will
be here, so please think it over.

21651.「おお <pc>よ よくぞ来た！\n 余と共に カルサドラ火山に\n 行ってくれ:
Oh, <pc>, how good of you to come! I
see you have decided to come with me to
Calsadora Volcano!

21652.「三闘士のオノを使い 転送装置を動かせば\n 魔物たちが あやしい儀式をしている:
If you use the Triad Axe to activate the transporter, you can get into the crater where the monsters are performing their mysterious
rituals!

21653.「儀式をしている魔物を率いるは\n 我が祖国のカタキ グルヤンラシュに相違ない。:
It must be Guryan Rush, the kataki of our
homeland, who leads the monsters performing
the ritual. Now is the time for revenge!

21654.「火口付近へと通じる 古代の転送装置は\n モガリム街道を 南に抜けた先の\n:
The ancient transfer station leading to the crater area is located in the center of the Raniakka Fault Zone, just south of Mogarim
Highway.

21655.「まずは ラニアッカ断層帯へ行き\n カルサドラ火山に 乗り込むとしようぞ！\n:
First, let's head to the Raniakka Fault Zone
and ride into Calsadora Volcano!
<pc>! You'll do it, won't you?

21656.「今こそ 古代の転送装置を使い\n グルヤンラシュが暗躍する カルサドラ火山の\:
Now is the time to use the ancient transporter to get into the vicinity of the crater of Calsadora Volcano where Guryan Rush lies in
wait!

21657.「火口付近へと通じる 古代の転送装置は\n モガリム街道を 南に抜けた先の\n:
The ancient transfer station leading to the crater area is located in the center of the Raniakka Fault Zone, just south of Mogarim
Highway.

21658.「オノの彫像がある 円形の台座が転送装置じゃ。\n 起動器具の 三闘士のオノは:
The circular pedestal on which the statue of the axe rests is the transporter. The activation device, the Triad Axe, is carried
by me, so please take me up to the pedestal.

21659.「それでは <pc>。\n 余は そちの後を ついていくでな。\n しっかり 頼:
Well then, <pc>. I'll be following
you. I'm counting on you!

21660.「これが 古代の転送装置じゃ。\n ……まあ 余にとっては\n 現役の シロモノ:
This is an ancient transporter. Well, for me,
it's a working white thing.

21661.「ごめん ごめん！ お待たせ！: Sorry! Sorry! Sorry to keep you waiting!

21662.「……皆 そろったようじゃな。\n それでは 余が作った 三闘士のオノで\n 転:
It looks like everyone is here. Now then,
let's activate the transporter with the Triad
Axe I made!

21664.「そのオノが できたのは <cs_pchero>が\n 材料を 集めてきてくれた:
You should be thankful that <cs_pchero>
gathered all the materials to make that axe,
right?

21665.「自分ひとりのチカラだけじゃ\n そのオノも できなかったんだから。\n ……ね:
I couldn't have made that axe by myself.
Right?

21667.「わかってくれれば いいのよ。\n さあ 行きましょう！:
You just have to understand. It's okay. Come
on, let's go!

21668.「よし！ それでは 転送装置を動かすぞえ！: Okay! Then let's get this transporter going!

21669.「……オノが導くは 母なる大地を見守る\n 三闘士の ふところ カルサドラ火山な:
The axe guides the Triad Guidance, the Watcher
of Mother Earth, Calsadora Volcano!

21672.「来たぞえ 来たぞえ……！: Here it comes. Here it comes...!

21673.「よいか？ 火口付近に着いたら\n グルヤンラシュが 儀式をしている場所を\n:
Okay? When you get to the crater, look for the
place where Guryan Rush is performing his
rituals! I'm counting on you, <cs_pchero>!

21675.古代の転送装置のチカラで\n<cs_pchero>と ビャン・ダオと チリは\n:
The power of an ancient transporter sent
<cs_pchero>, Byan Dao and Chiri near the
crater of Calsadora Volcano.

21676.「……よし。皆 そろったようじゃな。\n それでは 余の作った 三闘士のオノを使:
All right. It seems that everyone is here.
Then let's use the Triad Axe I made and go to
Calsadora Volcano.

21677.「……オノが導くは 母なる大地を見守る\n 三闘士の ふところ カルサドラ火山な:
The axe guides the Triad Guidance, the Watcher
of Mother Earth, Calsadora Volcano!

21679.古代の転送装置のチカラで\n<cs_pchero>と ビャン・ダオと チリは\n:
The power of an ancient transporter sent
<cs_pchero>, Byan Dao and Chiri near the
crater of Calsadora Volcano.

21680.「確かに すごい数の魔物ね。\n いったい 何をしているの？:
There are certainly a lot of monsters out
there. What on earth are they doing?

21681.「さあ 祈れ！ 祈りつづけよ！\n この世のすべてを 終わらせる……\n あの:
Come on, pray! Keep praying! Keep praying
until the One appears who can end all this!

21684.「……これ以上 好きにはさせぬ！\n 今こそ 貴様を 亡き者にしてくれるわ！:
I won't let you do what you want any more! Now
is the time for you to be dead!

21685.「キシャシャシャ……。\n 邪魔立てしようとて もう手遅れじゃ……。\n 間もな:
Kisha-sha-sha... it's too late to stop him...
he'll be here before you know it... and he'll
be here before you know it.

21686.「あの お方じゃと……！？\n さては そやつが グルヤンラシュじゃな！？: That's him, isn't it? You must be Guryan Rush!

21688.「ついに 姿を現したか……！\n 乱世の使者 奸臣グルヤンラシュッ！！:
At last, he has revealed himself! Guryan Lash,
the wicked one, the emissary of the turbulent
world!

21689.「乱世の使者だあ……？\n オレさまは そんなダセえ名前じゃねえ！:
Messenger of the turbulent world...? I don't
have a name like that!

21690.「オレさまは こいつらを束ねる……\n 魔鳥の頭目さまだアアア！: I am the Head Squarker who unites them all!

21692.「……ねえ ビャンくん。\n あなた そのグルなんとかってヤツの顔\n 見たこと:
Hey, Byan. You've never seen this Guru
something?

21693.「聞けッ！ 野郎ども！\n お前らに呼ばれた オレさまは ここへ来る前に\n イ:
Listen! Listen up! You called me here, and I
came up with this Squid slogan before you got
here!

21694.「オレたちのスローガン。それは……\n この恐怖！ カルサドラ発！ ……だアアア:
Our slogan. It's... this
fear! Calsadora! ...aaaaah!

21695.「このカルサドラから ドワチャッカ大陸を\n 恐怖のドン底に 突き落としてやろう:
From this Calsadora, let us plunge the
Dwachakka Continent into the depths of terror!

21697.「よーし。その手始めに オレたちの野望を\n 邪魔しようとする こいつらを\n:
All right. For starters, let's put those who
try to thwart our ambitions to the bottom of
the pit of terror!

21698.「いくぞ 野郎ども！！\n 魔鳥軍団の旗揚げじゃアアア！！！:
Let's go, boys! Let's raise the demon bird
army!

21699.「<cs_pchero>！ チリ！ 来るぞよ！\n 我がカタキ グルヤンラシュを:
<cs_pchero>! Chiri! Chile! My kataki, Guryan
Rush!

21700.「おいおい！ 信じられねーぜ！！\n こりずに また やられに来たってのかあ！？:
Hey, hey, hey! I can't believe it! You're not
going to let them get to you again, are you?

21701.「グヒャヒャヒャヒャ！ いいぜえ！\n そういうことなら お望みどおり もういっ:
Gwah-hyah-hyah-hyah! Yes! In that case, I'll
show you the depths of fear once more, as you
wish!

21702.「<cs_pchero>！ 来るぞよ！\n 我がカタキ グルヤンラシュを\n 今:
<cs_pchero>! They are coming! My katakana,
Guryan Rush, strike me this time!

21707.「ど どういうことじゃッ！？\n この者 グルヤンラシュではないのかえッ！？: What's going on? Is this man not Guryan Rush?

21708.「先ほどから ワケのわからぬことを！\n グルヤンラシュというのは 乱世の\n:
You've been talking nonsense! Guryan Rush is
the name of a legendary monster who triggered
a turbulent time in history!

21709.「そんな魔物 今の時代に いるはずがなかろう！\n 貴様 その伝説の魔物と ジャ:
There can't be such a monster in this day and
age! Did you mistake that legendary monster
for Lord Jamirus and come all the way here!

21711.「やめねえか！\n これ以上 オレさまに 恥かかすんじゃねえ！: Stop it! Don't embarrass me any more!

21712.「野郎ども！！ 出直しじゃアアア！！\n もっと チカラをつけて\n この地に:
You bastards! Let's get back on the road!
Let's come back to this land with more
strength!

21713.「なんということじゃ……。\n 我が宿敵 グルヤンラシュは\n すでに この世に:
What a thing to say that my old enemy, Guryan
Rush, is no longer with us.

21714.「あれほど 強大なチカラを持った\n グルヤンラシュさえ 時の流れの中では\n:
I never realized that even the mighty Guryan
Rush had been so transient in the course of
time.

21715.「奸臣グルヤンラシュの脅威も……\n あの地下帝国 ウルベアの威光も……\n 余:
The threat of the wicked Guryan Rush, the prestige of that Underground City, Urbea, and even the glory of the Gateria Empire I loved
so much...

21716.「時が すべてを終わらせてしまった……。\n そういうことか……。: Time has put an end to everything, I see.

21717.「ねえ ビャンくん。\n 確かに あの魔物は グルヤンラシュって\n ヤツじゃな:
Hey, Mr. Byan. I'm sure that monster wasn't
that Guryan Rush guy, but...

21718.「この地が 守られたのは あなたのおかげよ。\n 本当に ありがとう。:
This place was protected because of you. Thank
you so much.

21719.「……礼など 不要じゃ。\n 余は そなたたちのために動いたのではない。:
No need to thank me. I did not work for your
sake.

21720.「<cs_pchero>よ すまぬ。\n また そちを 振りまわしてしまったな。:
I'm sorry, <cs_pchero>. I'm sorry I've
pushed you around again.

21721.「そのわびといっては なんじゃが\n この 三闘士のオノを受け取ってたもれ。\n:
As a token of my gratitude, please accept this
Triad Axe. Use it whenever you need it.

21722.「これは そのわびを兼ねた 礼じゃ。\n 受け取ってたもれ。:
This is a courtesy gift to express my
gratitude. Please accept it.

21723.「……余の復讐は 終わった。\n いや…… はじめから 復讐など\n なかったの:
My revenge is over. No there was no revenge
from the beginning.

21724.「リウ老師……。\n そなたもまた グルヤンラシュのように\n 時の流れの中に:
Master Liu you too, like Guryan Rush, have
vanished into the mists of time.

21725.「そなたも 余を置いて 時の彼方へ……。\n うう…… 老師……。:
You too, leave me and go back in time,
Master...

21727.「……すまぬ <cs_pchero> チリ。\n 余は すべての希望を 失ってし:
I'm sorry <cs_pchero> Chiri. I have lost all
hope and I can no longer think...

21728.「ひとまず ガラクタ城に戻るぞよ……。\n ふたりとも 世話になったな……。:
We're going back to Junk Castle for a while...
thanks to both of you for your help...

21730.「<cs_pchero> ありがとう。\n あなたたちのおかげで\n 安心して:
<cs_pchero> Thank you. You guys have made me
feel so much safer.

21732.「あの子 親に捨てられたって言ってたよね？\n だから 人ごとじゃない気がして…:
She said her parents abandoned her, right? So
I felt like it wasn't just a person.

21733.「ねえ <cs_pchero>。\n ビャンくんのこと しっかり 面倒見てあげて:
Hey <cs_pchero>. Take good care of Byan. I
hope you can find some hope...

21734.「それじゃ 私は 行くね！\n また どこかで会いましょう！:
Well, I'm off then! I'll see you guys
somewhere else!
